description:
It`s time for the Celestial Maiden Squad`s company vacation!  They visit the Miho pine forest in Suruga with Momoko, but Onihime and Enki are there, too, to enjoy a vacation.  Before a fight can break out, they agree to call a truce and enjoy the beach.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mad Dance of the Giant Boobs!? The Pine Forest of Miho!
豊乳乱舞!? 三保の松原!
